title: Vendam Kadhal Pothum Pothum Poi Vidu Lyrics Jhangri
stanzas:
Thooki Erinjittu - Vendam Kadhal Pothum Pothum Poi Vidu Lyrics Jhangri Song Lyrics

Thooki erinjitu
pora pora kadhala
usura edukkura
podhum indha vethana

thunda naanum odaiyuren
neeyum sonna varthaiyaal
penne unna nenachuthaan
vazhkaiyo engo tholaikuren

ye kadhal ellaam maayama
thulir kanneer mattum 
minjumaa
vidhi endru solli
marakkavaa
indha kadhalai moththava
verukkavaa

unnai thunbathil thalli
rasithavan
inge inbamaai thulli
kudhikiraan

adi anbaaga neeyum
nandraaga vazha
ellaame seithene

penne modhal illa
kadhal thaan
inga ulagil engum illaiye
manam onna rendaa
serndhutaa adhupola
kadhal illaiye 

adi sonthangal unnai marakkalam
un sogangal kandu sirikkalaam
aanaal unnai naan nedrum
un nenjil vaippen
en anbu maaraathe

unakkaage naanum irukkuren
marukkaathe ennai nambidu
manasellaam neeye nirkkiraai
un idhayam konjam thandhidu

Thooki erinjitu
pora pora kadhala
thaniya nadakkuren
kalgal pogum padhaiyil

edhir paartha kannil thaan
sila neerthuli pookirathe
valiyodu anbe naan
veedhiyil alaigirene

vidai illaa kelvi pola
en kadhalum irukkirathe
oru varthai sonnaalum
en vazhkaiyum pizhaithidume

nillu sollaamal pogaathe
en kanneerum theeraathe
unnai naan paarkaamal
manam mullaaga maariduthe

unnai thunbathil thalli
rasiththavan ingae
inbamaai thulli kudhikkiraan

adi anbaaga neeyum
nandraaga vazha
ellaame seithene

adi sonthangal unnai marakkalam
un sogangal kandu sirikkalaam
aanaal unnai naan nedrum
un nenjil vaippen
en anbu maaraathe

vendaam kadhal
podhum podhum poi vidu
meendum orumurai 
vendaam andha vaethanai

oru kadhal kaayam aarumunn
marukadhal ennai ketkuthe
enakkaaga edhaiyum seiyyave
avan nenjam ellaam thudikkuthe

naan aasai ellaam verukkiren
mana vaazhkai siraiyil 
thavikkiren

unakkaaga ennai maatrave
en manasil idamum illaiye

unnai thunbathil thalli
rasithavan
inge inbamaai thulli
kudhikiraan

adi anbaaga neeyum
nandraaga vazha
ellaame seithene

penne modhal illa
kadhal thaan
inga ulagil engum illaiye
manam onna rendaa
serndhutaa adhupola
kadhal illaiye 

unakkaage naanum irukkuren
marukkaathe ennai nambidu
manasellaam neeye nirkkiraai
un idhayam konjam thandhidu
